bullet: Using professional tools like Figma/XD to prototype UI designs as needed
Component driven workflow based on creating reusable component designs, reducing workload over time
Strong familiarity with all tools provided in these powerful workstations
name: Figma
desc: Been using Figma as my primary tool for prototyping application designs for about 3 years. I started with Adobe XD and am also familiar with it. I don't consider myself a pro designer but I'm more than competent at using all tools provided by these prototyping softwares. If need be, I'm capable of designing a user interface using such a tool and have quite a lot of experience practicing this.
